title: AgencyRatingCriteria
description: Represents a class to specify a credit notation.

creditNotation.description: Indicates the agency rating criteria specified for the asset or issuer.

mismatchResolution.description: Indicator for options to be used if several agency ratings (>1) are specified and its necessary to identify specific charateristics. i.e (lowest or highest).

referenceAgency.description: identifies the dominant reference agency if there is a missmatch and several reference agencies exsist.

boundary.description: Indicates the boundary of a credit agency rating i.e minimum or maximum.
